markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghost Delivery Fulu](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2035)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 week

**Usage** affixed to structure, object, or creature

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _ghost delivery fulu's_ inscription resembles a dovecote with spirits around it, and it has a prominent stamp in red wax. This fulu activates once affixed, becoming the homing location of [_ghost courier fulus_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2034) with a matching stamp. Delivered _ghost courier fulu_ messages stick to the _ghost delivery fulu_ but can be easily removed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ghost Delivery Fulu
